Title: Creates a wage tax credit for employers who employ New York national guard members, reservists, volunteer firefighters and EMS personnel
Summary: Creates a $1,500 wage tax credit for employers who employ New York national guard members, reservists, volunteer firefighters and EMS personnel.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to creating a wage tax credit for employers who employ New York national guard members, reservists, volunteer firefighters and EMS personnel
